nodes.text: The Sullustan Home Guard was a fleet in the Commerce Guild's Punitive Security Forces stationed on the planet Sullust. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Home Guard joined the Confederacy, where it was charged with defending the Sullust sector and SoroSuub Corporation interests under the command of Admiral Dua Ningo.

The Sullustan Home Guard was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The Home Guard was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the Dark Empire Sourcebook, a 1993 supplement to West End Games' version of Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
